meanings.definition: A plant of the orchid family, typically with showy flowers.
meanings.sent1: The orchis in the garden bloomed beautifully.

meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an orchis, bright and captivating.
meanings.sent5: The orchis stood out among the other flowers with its vibrant colors.
